name: Awason
description: A water delivery app that lets users manage orders, set delivery days and times, view delivery profiles, leave reviews, and track account information and balance.

name: Weather App
description: An app that shows current temperature, wind speed and direction, and weather icons using the Meteomatics API for accurate, real-time data.

name: Movies app
description: An app that fetches popular movies from the TMDb API, displaying movie details, ratings, and imagess in a clean, interactive interface.

name: Guess The Flag
description: A simple quiz app where users pick the correct country flag from three options. Tracks scores in real time for a fun, replayable experience.

name: WeSplit
description: A handy bill-splitting app where users enter the total, number of people, and tip percentage to get both the overall and per-person totals instantly.

name: Better Rest
description: An app that calculates the ideal time to fall asleep based on your desired wake-up time, sleep duration, and coffee intake.

name: Shalowm Desserts
description: A web platform with two user roles: managers can upload, edit, and delete products and recipes, and use a recipe converter to scale ingredient quantities. Customers can browse, search, and place orders seamlessly.

name: Langton's Ant
description: A web-based simulation app that models Langton’s Ant behavior, visualizing the ant’s movement on a grid and allowing users to observe emergent patterns in real time.

name: Arioli
description: A web app for Arioli restaurant with user authentication, allowing customers to browse the menu, add multiple items to their cart, and place orders efficiently.

name: Media Aérea
description: Mobile app design for the software company Media Aerea to monitor project progress, track costs, and manage collaborators efficiently.

name: Iventory Management
description: Web application for the IT department at Universidad de Sonora with user authentication, enabling staff to manage inventory inputs and outputs, track assets, and streamline administrative tasks efficiently.

name: Drone Operator
description: Mobile app design for drone operators to perform pre-flight checks, and log pre- and post-operation tasks efficiently during their missions.

name: Route Sales
description: Mobile app design for managing route sales, allowing sales representatives to place orders, handle collections, store data offline, and view client locations on a map for efficient daily operations.

name: SFM
description: Mobile app design for store employees to handle tasks like pre-ticketing, printing product tags, mobile top-ups, price verification, and more.
